alert.note: Alert for Apple and Lucerne Valleys; San Bernardino County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 11:06AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of San Bernardino, Riverside and north central Orange Counties through 1145 AM PST... At 1106 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ontario, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Anaheim, Riverside, San Bernardino, Fontana, Moreno Valley, Ontario, Corona, Orange, Fullerton, Rialto, Hesperia, Chino, Redlands, Yorba Linda, I-15 Through The Cajon Pass, Lake Arrowhead, Rancho Cucamonga, Chino Hills, Upland and Highland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Apple and Lucerne Valleys; San Bernardino County Mountains
